channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Page Builder Gutenberg Blocks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Page Builder Gutenberg Blocks

item.title: CVE-2024-2369|2024-04-08T17:28:06.128Z -- Unknown -- Page Builder Gutenberg Blocks
item.description: The Page Builder Gutenberg Blocks WordPress plugin before 3.1.7 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
